thread.title: Nigeria: EFCC Invites Kuku, Former SA On Niger Delta
thread.title_full: Nigeria: EFCC Invites Kuku, Former SA On Niger Delta

title: Nigeria: EFCC Invites Kuku, Former SA On Niger Delta
text:
Nigeria: CBN Retains MPR At 13 Percent, Crr At 31 Percent 
According to the source: "It has been long that our men have been watching carefully the activities and disbursement of the huge funds meant for the amnesty programme. It seems they have concluded their findings and, hence, given him an invitation so respond to some gray areas. 
"If he is able to give satisfactory details of what our men are not clear of, he will be allowed to go and enjoy himself, if not, he will have to face further interrogation." 
The source further disclosed that Kuku might appear before the EFCC on July 28. 
When Daily Independent tried to get official confirmation on the matter from the spokesman of the EFCC, Wilson Uwujaren, efforts proved futile as all calls put across to his mobile phone were not responded to. A text message was also sent to him, with no response at the time of filing this report. Nigeria
